OCR_info.question_text: 바르게 계산한 것은 어느 것입니까?  ① $ \begin{array}{r}3.75 \\ + 5.6 \\ \hline 4.31\end{array} $  ② $ \begin{array}{r}3.75{~}{~} \\ + 5.6 \\ \hline 3.806\end{array} $  ③ $ \begin{array}{r}3.75 \\ + 5.6{~}{~} \\ \hline 9.35\end{array} $   ④ $ \begin{array}{r}3.75 \\ + 5.6{~}{~}{~}{~} \\ \hline 5.975\end{array} $  ⑤ $ \begin{array}{r}3.75 \\ + 5.6{~}{~}{~}{~}{~} \\ \hline 5.6375\end{array} $
